OOC: That reminds me.  Jason and i had a pretty strong partnership.  I gave 
him my character Depth Charge early on, and when Tigerhawk split into himself 
and Airazor, Jason would often have me borrow Tigerhawk when he was away.  
Recently, i even gave him Airazor to lower myself to the character limit.  
Now that he is gone, I'd like to say that those three characters are free. 
Anybody who wants one of them, e-mail me, and we'll work out the details.

--part1_fc.6dd3b1a.28406dad_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
